citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 a.m. on
17-DEC-19.
**Called listed contact number, no answer. Left voice message and waited 30 minutes.
